name: Effective Online Teaching
content: Learn how to design and deliver engaging online courses that support student success and active learning.

name: Leadership Essentials
content: Develop core leadership skills including communication, strategic thinking, and team management.

name: Academic Research Strategies
content: Master effective research planning, scholarly publishing techniques, and data management tools.

name: Resume & Interview Mastery
content: Craft powerful resumes and gain interview confidence to advance your professional journey.

name: Conference Presentation Skills
content: Enhance your public speaking and slide design to effectively present at academic or professional conferences.

name: Mentorship in Professional Development
content: Learn how to become a better mentor and mentee through structured development practices.

name: Data-Driven Decision Making
content: Explore how to use data analytics in education and training to drive smarter decisions.
